mapper.insert: insert into comment_t(cNum, symbol, writer, comment_t) values (cNum.nextval, #{symbol}, #{writer}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update comment_t set t_up = t_up + #{num} where cNum = #{cNum}
mapper.select: select count(likeNum) from liked where writer = #{writer} and cNum = #{cNum}
mapper.insert: insert into liked(likeNum, cNum, writer) values(likeNum.nextval, #{cNum}, #{writer})
mapper.delete: delete from liked where cNum = #{cNum} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: insert into report(reportNum, cNum, writer, content, reporter) values (reportNum.nextval, #{cNum}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{reporter})
